metadata.greeting: Hey George! Get ready for a weekend of amazing adventures! We've found some super cool stuff for you, like riding the DLR (choo choo!) and maybe even seeing some HUGE dinosaur skeletons. Plus, there's a farm with animals just waiting to meet you!

activities.title: Mudchute Farm Adventure (DLR ride!)
activities.description: Explore London's biggest urban farm! See llamas, sheep, pigs, and more. Perfect for a full day of animal fun and running around.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: It's a DLR train ride AND a farm with lots of animals for you to see and maybe even touch!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Shadwell, then DLR to Mudchute. 30 mins
transport.tip: Sit at the front of the DLR train for the best view!

activities.title: Hackney City Farm Visit
activities.description: Meet pigs, goats, donkeys and chickens! There's also a lovely cafe for a snack break and a pottery.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: You can see lots of farm animals up close and maybe even pet them!

transport.tip: Combine with a walk along the canal!

activities.title: Tumbling Bay Playground
activities.description: A massive playground with sand, water, climbing frames, and tunnels. Perfect for getting muddy and having an adventurous day!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: You can get super muddy in the sand and water play areas!

activities.title: Discover Children's Story Centre
activities.description: Interactive storytelling exhibits, dressing up, and character visits. A fun and engaging experience for little ones.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: You can dress up and play in the interactive exhibits!

transport.tip: Check the website for character visit schedules.

activities.title: Young V&A Play Area
activities.description: A dedicated play area for under 5s with interactive exhibits and design workshops. A great place to explore and create.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: It's a free space where you can play and explore different materials and designs!

transport.tip: Check the website for workshop schedules.

activities.title: Victoria Park Playground & Deer
activities.description: Two playgrounds, a boating lake, and a deer enclosure! Plenty of space to run around and enjoy the outdoors.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: You can see real deer and play on the swings and slides!

transport.tip: Pack a picnic to enjoy by the lake.

activities.title: Dinosaur Adventure!
activities.description: See a HUGE T-Rex skeleton and learn all about dinosaurs! Explore the rest of the museum's amazing collections too.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: It's got a real T-Rex skeleton and lots of other dinosaur bones!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria line to Green Park, then Piccadilly line to South Kensington. 45 mins
transport.parking: Limited street parking, paid car parks nearby
transport.tip: Go early to avoid the crowds!

activities.title: All Aboard! London Transport Museum
activities.description: Climb on old buses and trains, try the tube simulator, and explore the All Aboard play zone. A must for any transport enthusiast!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: You can climb on real buses and trains and even try driving a tube train!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria line to Oxford Circus, then Central line to Covent Garden. 40 mins
transport.parking: Limited street parking, paid car parks nearby

activities.title: RAF Museum: Planes Galore!
activities.description: Explore huge aircraft hangers filled with planes and helicopters! There's also a 4D cinema and an outdoor playground.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: You can see lots of real planes and helicopters up close!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Gospel Oak, then Overground to West Hampstead, then Jubilee line to Colindale. 50 mins
transport.tip: Check the website for 4D cinema showtimes.

activities.title: Crystal Palace Dinosaurs & Playground
activities.description: Discover Victorian dinosaur statues on islands! There's also a farm, maze, and a great playground.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: You can see life-sized dinosaur statues!

transport.tip: Bring a picnic to enjoy by the lake.

activities.title: Science Museum: The Garden
activities.description: The Garden is a dedicated area for under 5s to explore science through play. Plus, check out the Making the Modern World gallery for TRAINS!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: It has a special area just for little ones to play and learn, and you can see real TRAINS!

transport.fromHackney: Overground to Highbury & Islington, then Victoria line to Green Park, then Piccadilly line to South Kensington. 45 mins
transport.parking: Limited street parking, paid car parks nearby
transport.tip: The Garden can get busy, so go early!

bookAhead.title: Book Ahead
bookAhead.subtitle: Coming up in the next 2-8 weeks

activities.title: Hey Duggee Live!
activities.description: Join Duggee and the Squirrels for a fun-filled live show with singing, dancing, and lots of badges!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: It's Hey Duggee live! You can earn badges just like the Squirrels!

transport.tip: Book tickets early as they sell out fast!

activities.title: Peppa Pig Live
activities.description: Sing and dance with Peppa, George, and their friends in this interactive live show!
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: You can see Peppa Pig and George live on stage!

transport.tip: Bring your wellies in case there are muddy puddles!

activities.title: Dinosaur World Live
activities.description: See life-size dinosaur puppets come to life on stage! A thrilling and educational experience for dinosaur lovers.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: You can see HUGE, life-size dinosaur puppets!

transport.tip: Some dinosaurs can be a bit scary, so be prepared!

activities.title: The Gruffalo
activities.description: Watch the classic story of the Gruffalo come to life on stage with catchy songs and amazing puppets.
activities.whyGeorgeWillLove: It's The Gruffalo! You know all the words!

transport.tip: A great show for first-time theatregoers.

activities.title: Bluey's Big Play
activities.description: Join Bluey, Bingo, Bandit, and Chilli in this brand new theatrical adaptation of the Emmy® award-winning television series.

transport.tip: Book tickets early as they sell out fast!
